============
packmol step
============

        :target: https://travis-ci.org/molssi-seamm/packmol_step

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/packmol_step.svg

A step for a SEAMM flowchart for building periodic fluid boxes using Packmol


* Free software: BSD license
* Documentation: https://packmol-step.readthedocs.io.
